text: Jean-François "J. F." Jacques (born April 29, 1985) is a Canadian professional ice hockey left winger. He plays for the EC KAC of the Austrian Hockey League (EBEL). He has also played in the National Hockey League (NHL) with the Edmonton Oilers and the Anaheim Ducks. He was drafted by the Edmonton Oilers with the 68th pick in the 2003, NHL Entry Draft. He has played in the NHL for the Edmonton Oilers for 5 seasons. In the 2011-2012 season, he played for the Anaheim Ducks. In July 2012, he was signed to the Florida Panthers. ==Career statistics== Regular season Playoffs Season Team League GP G A Pts PIM GP G A Pts PIM 2000–01 Cap–de–la–Madelaine Estacades QMAAA 39 22 13
